titleStmt.title: The young soldier's desire answered, or, A piece of military discipline wherein is shewed, distances, facings, doublings, counter-marches, and wheelings : with some firings both offensive and defensive against an enemy / by Edward Adams.
titleStmt.author: Adams, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Evans ... and are to be sold by William Jacob ... and the author ...,
